name: Vintage Circus/Carnival Delight
description:
This theme includes festive stripes, dots, chevrons, solids and other fun graphic and floral prints.  The fun mix of fabrics will include various shades of red, yellow, blue, pink and JUST a hint of orange and green.  Vintage + Modern = Super Hip

Flags are sewn and double sided, so you can see them from both sides and will last for years and years.

The top trim is "SOLID RED" unless you upgrade to a different solid or print.  

The 10' overall length includes 2' of trim at each end for hanging.

The $35 price is for one increment of 6 feet of flags: you get 9 large flags (7" wide at the top x 8" top to bottom).  The bunting can be made as long as you like in 6' increments.  For example, if you choose a qty. of "3", your bunting will be 18' long, plus 2' of ties at each end to make 22' overall.  *(If you want 3 separate buntings please email me and let me know, otherwise the 18' of flags will come on one bunting.)


DISCOUNTS: If you are purchasing a qty. of "5" or more of this item, please ask about our current wholesale promotions (available to designers, retailers AND the public!).

*IMPORTANT*: We do not use a factory for our specialty bunting, therefore each one is one of a kind and unique.  The photos are EXAMPLES only of the fabrics we will use for your bunting.  Requests to make yours look EXACTLY like the ones shown will not be accepted.  Thank you!

PERSONALIZATION: letters can be added for $2 each! Email us for your custom order.

Have a special request? Custom upgrades are accepted but will be charged accordingly.  Email us at: starlitnest@earthlink.net for a quote on orders of $175+ for our special promotions.

Please allow extra time for larger orders: email us with the date of your event if you need this by a certain date so we can make you aware of a possible additional rush fee!

We use ONLY 100% cotton fabric flags!  Quality is a MUST at Starlit Nest.

name: Shabby Chic Dream
description:
This theme includes light florals in small to large scales, mixed with accents of sweet stripes and tiny dots.  Think PINK, aqua, sky blue, white, gray and JUST a hint of yellow and green.  It's the way you feel on a lazy Spring morning, watching hummingbirds and butterflies from your hammock while sipping a sweet lemongrass tea from your grandmother's china tea set.  

Flags are sewn and double sided, so you can see them from both sides and will last for years and years.

The top trim is "SOLID WHITE" unless you upgrade to a different solid or print.  

The 10' overall length includes 2' of trim at each end for hanging.

The $35 price is for one increment of 6 feet of flags: you get 9 large flags (7" wide at the top x 8" top to bottom).  The bunting can be made as long as you like in 6' increments.  For example, if you choose a qty. of "3", your bunting will be 18' long, plus 2' of ties at each end to make 22' overall.  *(If you want 3 separate buntings please email me and let me know, otherwise the 18' of flags will come on one bunting.)


DISCOUNTS: If you are purchasing a qty. of "5" or more of this item, please ask about our current wholesale promotions (available to designers, retailers AND the public!).

*IMPORTANT*: We do not use a factory for our specialty bunting, therefore each one is one of a kind and unique.  The photos are EXAMPLES only of the fabrics we will use for your bunting.  Requests to make yours look EXACTLY like the ones shown will not be accepted.  Thank you!

PERSONALIZATION: letters can be added for $2 each! Email us for your custom order.

Have a special request? Custom upgrades are accepted but will be charged accordingly.  Email us at: starlitnest@earthlink.net for a quote on orders of $175+ for our special promotions.

Please allow extra time for larger orders: email us with the date of your event if you need this by a certain date so we can make you aware of a possible additional rush fee!

We use ONLY 100% cotton fabric flags!  Quality is a MUST at Starlit Nest.
